name: LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF WILDLIFE AND FISHERIES
description: Responsible for managing and protecting Louisianas abundant natural resources.
sampleDescriptions: Provide assistance to aid the Louisiana Shrimp Task Force with Federal policies, legislation, statues, treaties, regulations and other activities that impact the Louisiana shrimp industry.
